thread.title: Handball goal earns Hannover 1-0 win at Cologne
thread.title_full: Handball goal earns Hannover 1-0 win at Cologne

title: Handball goal earns Hannover 1-0 win at Cologne
text:
Handball goal earns Hannover controversial 1-0 win at Cologne in Bundesliga THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   11:34 amLast   11:34 am   
People: 
Germany (196) 

BERLIN â€” Leon Andreasen scored with his arm to give Hannover a controversial 1-0 win at Cologne in the Bundesliga, denying the home side the chance to go fourth on Sunday. 
Cologne had the better of the first half but the visitors went ahead in the 38th when Andreasen knocked the ball in with his right arm after a corner. The goal was given despite the home side's protests. 
Cologne forward Anthony Modest forced goalkeeper Ron-Robert Zieler into action midway through the second half. Milos Jojic was next to test him from a free kick, and the Hannover goalkeeper went on to make another good save from Modeste to safeguard all three points. 
Bottom side Stuttgart was hosting promoted Ingolstadt later.
